text: Mee gu oho nia gowaa hai daumaha gi nia balu god, gu oho nia duludulu hadu, guu hele gi lala nia ada balu god ahina go Asherah. Gei mee gu oho gi mooho hagaligiligi labelaa di ada gihaa baalanga mmee dela ne hai go Moses, dela e hagaingoo bolo Nehushtan. Gaa dae mai gi di madagoaa deelaa, gei nia daangada Israel nogo dutudu nadau ‘incense’ e hagalaamua di maa.18.4 Numbers 21.9
